thread.title: Match or no match for Kartik Aaryan-Nushrat Bharucha in 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2'
thread.title_full: Match or no match for Kartik Aaryan-Nushrat Bharucha in 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Match or no match for Kartik Aaryan-Nushrat Bharucha in 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2'
text:
Cricket is a religion in India, but it can also be the bone of contention in a relationship. Producer Abhishek Pathak and director Luv Ranjan's forthcoming film, Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2 (PKP2), drives home this point.
READ: 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' boys bonded during the Goa vacation
Listen to songs of Pyaar Ka Punchnama on Gaana.com
The game plays a significant part in the relationship between Gogo (Kartik Aaryan), a guy with an uber cool attitude and the rich spoilt Chikoo (Nushrat Bharucha), who loves pink dresses and high heels in the movie.
When Gogo sips his beer while watching an India match and screams himself hoarse every time our players send the ball across the boundary, Chikoo joins him too, sporting the famous Tendulkar jersey (though the cricket icon retired in 2013) to please him. What she really wants, though, is to be pampered by Gogo or hang out with her gang of girls. Interestingly, Nushrat is a huge Sachin fan in real life. Such is her fondness for the Master Blaster that she even has a coveted No. 10 jersey in her wardrobe.
Already butchered once in the first outing, love returns for more whipping in the sequel .
Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2 , presented by Viacom18 Motion Pictures and produced by Panorama Studios, releases October 16.
